sentences.sentence: One of main parts that outsole part outsole also is glue face shoe.
sentences.translation: 二外底部分外底也是胶面鞋的主要部件之一。

sentences.sentence: And after the fourth wearing the flapping of the outsole was a very obvious annoyance.
sentences.translation: 第四次穿的时候，外底的来回移动就让我非常的烦恼。

sentences.sentence: The new sun logo is embossed on a suede footbed as well as showcased on the extremely lightweight EVA outsole.
sentences.translation: 新太阳标识凸显在羊皮鞋床表面上，在超轻便的EVA鞋底上同样也有这样的标识。
